Metadata.Title: The Doomsday Heist 3.1
Metadata.Description: [Objective] : Retrieve all gold bars from the main vault.Good day agent,You have successfully prevented the heist and now the loot is up for grabs, the plan is still solid, all you need to do is take care of the guards.The required items to help you further  you will find inside the main vault with the gold, you will have to tamper with the electric devices to gain access.Good luck agent, I shall leave you to prepare...[Exit] : Truck
